item.title: 音乐播放器
item.description:
添加音乐播放器

方法一：网易云音乐

官网：https://github.com/metowolf/MetingJS

直接掉接口：

<!-- require MetingJS -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/meting@2/dist/Meting.min.js"></script>

<meting-js
 server="netease"
 type="playlist"
 id="117882154"> #网易云音乐id
</meting-js>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="zh-CN">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
 <title>音乐播放器</title>
 <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer/dist/APlayer.min.css">
</head>
<body>
 <!-- APlayer 容器 -->
 <div id="aplayer"></div>

 <!-- MetingJS 元素 -->
 <meting-js
 server="netease"
 type="playlist"
 id="117882154"
 fixed="true"
 autoplay="false">
 </meting-js>

 <!-- 引入 APlayer 和 MetingJS -->
 <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer/dist/APlayer.min.js"></script>
 <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/meting@2/dist/Meting.min.js"></script>

 <script>
 // 全局变量用于存储APlayer实例
 let ap = null;

 // 初始化播放器
 function initPlayer() {
 // 等待MetingJS加载完成
 const checkInterval = setInterval(() => {
 const playerElement = document.getElementById('aplayer');
 if (playerElement && playerElement.aplayer) {
 clearInterval(checkInterval);
 ap = playerElement.aplayer;
 console.log('APlayer实例已获取', ap);

 // 恢复播放状态
 restorePlaybackState();
 }
 }, 100);
 }

 // 恢复播放状态
 function restorePlaybackState() {
 const playInfo = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("playInfo"));
 if (!playInfo) {
 console.log('没有找到之前的播放记录');
 return;
 }

 // 等待APlayer完全加载
 setTimeout(() => {
 try {
 // 切换歌曲
 ap.list.switch(playInfo.index);
 console.log(`正在恢复第${playInfo.index + 1}首歌曲...`);

 // 等待歌曲加载
 setTimeout(() => {
 // 调整播放进度
 ap.seek(playInfo.currentTime);

 // 恢复播放/暂停状态
 if (!playInfo.paused) {
 ap.play();
 console.log('已恢复播放');
 } else {
 console.log('已恢复播放进度（暂停状态）');
 }
 }, 800);
 } catch (error) {
 console.error('恢复播放状态时出错:', error);
 }
 }, 500);
 }

 // 页面销毁前监听
 window.onbeforeunload = () => {
 if (ap) {
 // 将播放信息用对象封装，并存入到localStorage中
 const playInfo = {
 index: ap.list.index,
 currentTime: ap.audio.currentTime,
 paused: ap.audio.paused
 };
 localStorage.setItem("playInfo", JSON.stringify(playInfo));
 console.log('播放状态已保存', playInfo);
 }
 };

 // 页面加载后初始化播放器
 window.addEventListener('load', initPlayer);
 </script>
</body>
</html>

方法2：原生 酷狗音乐

官网：https://github.com/DIYgod/APlayer

中文文档：https://aplayer.js.org/#/zh-Hans/

自定义音乐

<!-- custom.html -->
<!--改为了本地引入 <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer/dist/APlayer.min.css"> -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer/dist/APlayer.min.js"></script>

<div id="aplayer"></div>

<script>
 // 音乐数据预处理
 const musicDir = '{{ .Site.Home.Permalink }}music/';
 const songs = [
 '任贤齐-伤心太平洋',
 '张韶涵-隐形的翅膀'
 ];

 let audios = [];
 songs.forEach((item) => {
 const songInfo = item.split('-');
 audios.push({
 name: songInfo[1],
 artist: songInfo[0],
 url: musicDir + item + '/song.mp3', // 歌曲路径
 cover: musicDir + item + '/cover.jpg', // 封面路径
 lrc: musicDir + item + '/lyric.lrc', // 歌词路径
 });
 });

 const ap = new APlayer({
 container: document.getElementById('aplayer'),
 fixed: true,
 lrcType: 3,
 audio: audios
 });

 /**
 * 页面销毁前监听
 */
 window.onbeforeunload = () => {
 // 将播放信息用对象封装，并存入到localStorage中
 const playInfo = {
 index: ap.list.index,
 currentTime: ap.audio.currentTime,
 paused: ap.paused
 };
 localStorage.setItem("playInfo", JSON.stringify(playInfo));
 };

 /**
 * 页面加载后监听
 */
 window.onload = () => {
 // 从localStorage取出播放信息
 const playInfo = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("playInfo"));
 if (!playInfo) {
 return;
 }
 // 切换歌曲
 ap.list.switch(playInfo.index);
 // 等待500ms再执行下一步(切换歌曲需要点时间，不能立马调歌曲进度条)
 setTimeout(() => {
 // 调整时长
 ap.seek(playInfo.currentTime);
 // 是否播放
 if (!playInfo.paused) {
 ap.play()
 }
 }, 500);
 };
</script>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="zh-CN">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
 <title>全局音乐播放器</title>
 <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer/dist/APlayer.min.css">
 <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer/dist/APlayer.min.js"></script>
 <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/meting@2/dist/Meting.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
 <div class="buttons">
 <button class="active" data-id="117882154">歌单1</button>
 <button data-id="2399935867">歌单2</button>
 <button data-id="2057627502">歌单3</button>
 </div>

 <div id="aplayer"></div>

 <script>
 // 全局变量用于存储APlayer实例
 let ap = null;
 let currentPlaylistId = '117882154';

 // 初始化播放器
 function initPlayer() {
 // 等待MetingJS加载完成
 const checkInterval = setInterval(() => {
 const playerElement = document.getElementById('aplayer');
 if (playerElement && playerElement.aplayer) {
 clearInterval(checkInterval);
 ap = playerElement.aplayer;
 console.log('APlayer实例已获取', ap);

 // 恢复播放状态
 restorePlaybackState();
 }
 }, 100);
 }

 // 恢复播放状态
 function restorePlaybackState() {
 const playInfo = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("playInfo"));
 if (!playInfo) {
 console.log('没有找到之前的播放记录');
 return;
 }

 // 等待APlayer完全加载
 setTimeout(() => {
 try {
 // 切换歌曲
 ap.list.switch(playInfo.index);
 console.log(`正在恢复第${playInfo.index + 1}首歌曲...`);

 // 等待歌曲加载
 setTimeout(() => {
 // 调整播放进度
 ap.seek(playInfo.currentTime);

 // 恢复播放/暂停状态
 if (!playInfo.paused) {
 ap.play();
 console.log('已恢复播放');
 } else {
 console.log('已恢复播放进度（暂停状态）');
 }
 }, 800);
 } catch (error) {
 console.error('恢复播放状态时出错:', error);
 }
 }, 500);
 }

 // 页面销毁前监听
 window.onbeforeunload = () => {
 if (ap) {
 // 将播放信息用对象封装，并存入到localStorage中
 const playInfo = {
 index: ap.list.index,
 currentTime: ap.audio.currentTime,
 paused: ap.audio.paused
 };
 localStorage.setItem("playInfo", JSON.stringify(playInfo));
 console.log('播放状态已保存', playInfo);
 }
 };

 // 创建Meting元素
 function createMetingElement(playlistId) {
 const existingMeting = document.querySelector('meting-js');
 if (existingMeting) existingMeting.remove();

 const metingElement = document.createElement('meting-js');
 metingElement.setAttribute('server', 'netease');
 metingElement.setAttribute('type', 'playlist');
 metingElement.setAttribute('id', playlistId);
 metingElement.setAttribute('fixed', 'true');
 metingElement.setAttribute('autoplay', 'false');

 document.getElementById('aplayer').appendChild(metingElement);

 // 重新初始化播放器
 initPlayer();
 }

 // 按钮点击事件
 document.querySelectorAll('button').forEach(button => {
 button.addEventListener('click', function() {
 const playlistId = this.getAttribute('data-id');

 // 更新按钮状态
 document.querySelectorAll('button').forEach(btn => {
 btn.classList.remove('active');
 });
 this.classList.add('active');

 // 保存当前播放状态
 if (ap) {
 const playInfo = {
 index: ap.list.index,
 currentTime: ap.audio.currentTime,
 paused: ap.audio.paused
 };
 localStorage.setItem("playInfo", JSON.stringify(playInfo));
 }

 // 创建新的Meting元素
 createMetingElement(playlistId);
 currentPlaylistId = playlistId;
 });
 });

 // 初始创建Meting元素
 createMetingElement(currentPlaylistId);
 </script>
</body>
</html>
